KitchenFunction: ^"You can come here for breakfest, lunch, and dinner."
^"You can come really anytime your hungry. Eating will rejuvinate you and lower your fatigue"
^"Crap, you don't got an eating disorder or something do you?"
^"Sorry, was worried for a sec that I might've been insensitive."
^"Well, uh, lets go see what they got today."
^"If I recall, today is pancake day?"
^I spend the morning having a quiet, awkward meal with Timothy.
^I feel refreshed by the delicous meal.
